title: Cercina (grasshopper)
text:
Cercina is an Asian <a href="genus">genus</a> of <a href="grasshopper">grasshopper</a>s in the subfamily Caryandinae (it was placed previously in the <a href="Oxyinae">Oxyinae</a>) first described by
<a href="Carl%20St%C3%A5l">Carl Stål</a> (1833–1878), a Swedish entomologist.
Species include:
